title: Honesty
desc: My website is telling only the truth, no belief and behaviours intentional manipulation.

title: Regeneration
desc: My website provide direct or indirect regeneration; carbon offsetting, reforestation, etc.

title: Resilience
desc: My website can be accessed in inconsistent and slow connection.

title: Energy
desc: My website is using green hosting, caching and optimised geographical distribution.

title: Efficiency
desc: My website has CPU and GPU optimised usage; no unnecessary process or motion.

title: SEO
desc: My website has holistic content management and constant global review.

title: Branding
desc: My website prefers dark with less blue.

title: UX/UI
desc: My website reduces as much as possible users journey length.

title: Technology
desc: My website uses open-source, energy efficient, languages and frameworks.

title: Typography
desc: My website uses WOFF2 optimised font and/or variable fonts.

title: Images
desc: My website uses vector image first, bitmap images second, with AVIF/WebP and optimisation methods (resolution, compression, blur, etc).

title: Video
desc: My website avoids unnecessary and autoplay videos.

title: Simplicity
desc: Everything on my website is necessary (KISS).
